directions: Combine tomatoes, onion, sugar substitute, salt, cloves, ginger, and black pepper in a microwave-safe bowl; cook in microwave on high for 15 minutes. Add evaporated milk and chicken to tomato mixture; cook in microwave until warmed, about 45 seconds.
Ladle soup into 5 bowls and sprinkle 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese onto each serving.
ingredients: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans fire-roasted diced tomatoes, undrained
1 1/2 tablespoons sucralose sugar substitute (such as Splenda®) (optional)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can fat-free evaporated milk
title: Low-Fat Fire-Roasted Tomato and Chicken Soup
